Iris LaVerne Davis-Hicks (April 30, n'afọ 1950 na September 18, n'afọ 2021) bụ onye America na-agba ọsọ n'okporo ụzọ na n'ọhịa bụ onye ọkachamara na 100-meter dash. Ọ bụ onye mmeri nke 1971 Pan American Games na ihe omume ahụ ma nwetakwara ihe nrite ọla edo na 4 × 100-meter relay. Ọ nọchitere anya United States na 1972 Munich Olympics ma jiri ihe nrite ghara inweta ihe nrite ugboro abụọ: nke mbụ na 100m, na-etinye nke anọ n'azụ Silvia Chivás nke Cuba, mgbe ahụ na relay, ebe Chivás ọzọ meriri ya na ọla nchara na ụkwụ ikpeazụ.
A mụrụ Davis na ezinụlọ ndị Africa America na Pompano Beach, Florida
Na mba ahụ, ọ bụ onye mmeri ugboro anọ: ugboro abụọ na 100m (1971, 1973) na ugboro abụọ na 60m dash (1972, 1973)
Ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na 100-yard dash na afọ 1969 na afọ 1970, ma nwee ọkwa atọ kachasị elu na 100 m na 1972 Olympic trials na 1972 outdoor championships.
Ọ bụ onye otu Tigerbelles collegiate team maka Mahadum Tennessee State, nke nwere akụkọ ihe mere eme siri ike nke ụmụ nwanyị na-agba ọsọ gụnyere onye mmeri Olympic abụọ Wyomia Tyus.
